definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment/also written 哪裡|哪里
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment/also written 哪裡|哪里

sentences.english: They could even count the fruit in Soviet orchards and analyze their crops.
sentences.chinese: 他们甚至可以数出苏联果园里的果树并分析其产量。

sentences.english: To me, in the love of the river, I often feel like I was upstream .
sentences.chinese: 于我，在爱情的河流里，我经常觉得自己在逆流而上。

sentences.english: There is also a Children's Corner in our zoo.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里还有个儿童乐园。

sentences.english: Perhaps they spent time in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们在院子里打发时光。

sentences.english: Place the rice noodles in a large bowl, and cover with warm water.
sentences.chinese: 把米线放进一个大碗里，然后用温水浸泡。

sentences.english: In those days we did not need spies to watch the enemy's movement .
sentences.chinese: 在那些日子里，我们不需要情报员注意敌人动向。

sentences.english: However, Toni, who knows Ribery well, believes the Bianconeri should sign him.
sentences.chinese: 然而托尼很了解里贝里，并且相信尤文会签下他。

sentences.english: His body was found in the Floor hole.
sentences.chinese: 他的躯体发现在楼栋里。

sentences.english: Poetry prophecy is an exotic flower in remote mountains which is in full bloom in our Chinese classics hundred-flower garden.
sentences.chinese: 诗谶是盛开在中国古典文学百花园里的一株深山奇葩。

sentences.english: For the past few days, there has instead been rioting in the square.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的几天里，广场上没有垃圾，倒是有一场暴乱。

sentences.english: Shepherd's purse green season, and grandmother would have to accompany her mother to pick the fields shepherd's purse.
sentences.chinese: 荠菜青青时节，外婆便要母亲陪着去田野里挑荠菜。

sentences.english: Our supplies for this month are in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 我们这个月的生活用品在橱子里。

sentences.english: The cunning thief stole the money out of the man's pocket.
sentences.chinese: 狡滑的小偷从那位男士的口袋里偷了钱。

sentences.english: He heard the contents of the glass being poured into the sink .
sentences.chinese: 他听到杯中物被倒进水盆里。

sentences.english: Soon he became the top student at school.
sentences.chinese: 很快他便成了学校里的尖子生。

sentences.english: The last chapter gives an indication of the state-of-the-art in an industrial environment.
sentences.chinese: 最后一章在一种工业环境里表示最新型。

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to hit the target/to hit the nail on the head
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
Zhongdu, capital of China during the Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), modern day Beijing
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
